thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: For the 5th time
thread.title_full: For the 5th time - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jack D
title: For the 5th time
text:
We where here for the 5th time. Again the service, the room, the bed, everething was very good.
Also the internet check inn, make it very easy.
The breakfast was good, very much choice, good quality en very plezant service.
Next to two underground stations, a very good pub (the minories) with tv screens for football games. Perfect.
